channel.title: 2018 Reads on Another Year of Books
channel.description: Recent content in 2018 Reads on Another Year of Books

item.title: Another Year of Books: The 2018 Recap
item.description: Well, 2019 is approaching, surely and quickly, and thereâ€™s nothing we can do to slow it down. As 2018 comes to a close, and the goal is officially complete (and then some), it felt like it was time to think back, remember to the good days (or reads), and the bad ones (again, or reads), especially when we are all feeling like this: I had to dig a little deep to remember which books I liked the most, because there were so many of them.
